original_title: Dr. Anil Jasinghe appointed Secretary to Ministry of Health and Media
original_body_lines: Dr. Anil Jasinghe has been appointed as the new Secretary to the Ministry of Health and Media by President Anura Kumara Dissanayake.
The appointment letter was handed over to Dr. Jasinghe today (10) at the Presidential Secretariat, the President’s Media Division (PMD) said.
